short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This addon allows ReloTalent customers to quickly harvest properties info from real estate websites to their working environment

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At ReloTalent we know how fast the real estate market is evolving, and how important it is for our customers to quickly find and propose properties to their clients.

This is why we created this Chrome Add-on, to allow you to easily create properties in ReloTalent account directly from the real estate websites you are surfing for work!

Find the property your customer needs then follow 4 easy steps steps to create it, the property will be automatically imported in your ReloTalent environment and you will be able to quickly share it with your client.

ReloTalent Real Estate Properties Harvester is a Google Chrome addon that allows users to harvest data from real estate websites to their software environment. Once the data is harvested, it is used to create a propery in the software, which can then be suggested to users. The entire process of finding a house can be completed interactively in the software.

The Real Estate Data Harvester is designed for relocation companies who help their customers find a new house abroad or in their new country of assignment. The addon makes it easy for relocation companies to quickly and easily gather data from a variety of real estate websites, so that they can find the best properties for their customers.

ReloTalent Real Estate Properties Harvester is easy to use. Once the addon is installed, users simply need to visit a real estate website the addon has been enabled for and click on the addon's icon. The addon will then automatically harvest the data from the website and create a property in the software.

The data that is harvested by the Real Estate Data Harvester includes:

- Property address
- Property price
- Property description
- Property photos

ReloTalent Real Estate Properties Harvester is a simple and powerful tool that can help relocation companies save time and effort when finding a new house for their customers. The addon is easy to use and it can harvest data from a variety of real estate websites.

Here are some of the benefits of using ReloTalent Real Estate Properties Harvester:

- Save time and effort: The addon can automatically harvest data from real estate websites, so you don't have to do it manually.
- Improve accuracy: The addon is designed to harvest accurate data from real estate websites.
- Increase efficiency: The addon can help you find the best properties for your customers more quickly and easily.
- Improve customer satisfaction: The addon can help you provide a better service to your customers by giving them access to a wider range of properties.

If you are a relocation company, ReloTalent Real Estate Properties Harvester is a valuable tool that can help you save time, improve accuracy, and increase efficiency.
